Arrow: The message sent asked for another person. whom I recognize. His nam=
e is Deemos, and he used to be both an ally and an enemy of mine at differe=
nt times. He's deadly, but so are we.

He crosses his arms.

Arrow: I used =
to know alot of others, but I broke off from them a bit back. The one named=
 Airbomber got very jealous of me. He was only greedy and an egomaniac, how=
ever. Where could we find Deemos? I've long since forgotten his signal...

=
  ----- Original Message -----
  From: RoboRick007
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups=
.com
  Sent: Monday, August 12, 2002 12:56 AM
  Subject: Re: Secret Message=
s


  : : Diesel : :

  He looked at Arrow. He eyes flashed and gave a very=
 evil sense. You knew that he had a maniacle smile under his faceplate.

  =
Diesel: You know it. However we should take care of some things here first.=
 If we go to join Razor, we may need more men. Know of anyone?
    ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
    From: Degenerate 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com =

    Sent: Monday, August 12, 2002 12:39 AM
    Subject: Re: Secret Message=
s


    OOC: If I can be serious for a minute, this group is the epitome of=
 seriousness and does not deserve to be subjected to a silly post. Prepare =
for the rebirth of the original rookie monster of NBW.

    BIC:

    Arrow=
 hears Diesel's voice. His back was turned to his old ally. He tries to rem=
ember where he had seen Diesel before. Memories of his past come flying bac=
k to him. They return easily when he needs them enough, he finds, the Radic=
ons hadn't done a very good job of erasing these memories. He slowly turns =
around, recalling Diesel's place in his tumultuous life.

    Arrow: Ah, ye=
s, Diesel, the message. It has been a long time, hasn't it? Shall we get to=
 business immediately?

    Arrow could barely remember Razor. He didn't ho=
ld anything against the Radicons for damaging his memory so badly. They did=
 what they had to, Arrow had attempted to kill them.

    Arrow: So, what n=
ow? Do we head to Earth?
    ~~~~~
    Deemos was sitting in a meeting, bor=
ed.

    Leader: Gentlemen, we must all band together and stop this menace!=
 We cannot allow this other club to gain the upper hand! We truly have the =
best flag! The others will pay for their disagreeance!

    Deemos: What ki=
nd of club is this? And is disagreeance a word?

    Leader: This is not a =
club, this is a council. It's the Council of Evil. And yes, Disagreeance is=
 a word.

    Deemos: No, you said "We cannot allow this other club to gain=
 the upper hand," apparently if there is this "other" club, this is a club.=


    Leader: See here--

    Deemos: I was the one who held a council. We =
were the Mafia, the most imposing group to ever exist save for the Alliance=
.

    Leader: Sir, I'm certain I don't know what you are talking about.

 =
   Deemos: If this so called council is so evil, why is it that we are not =
attacking, and why is it that we are not spilling blood.

    Leader: Mech =
fluid.

    Deemos: It's the same thing. I've spilled alot of it.

    Lead=
er: Well, sir, you see, we like to bide our time, and then--

    Deemos: T=
hen you burn someone else's flag. Then they come and burn yours. You don't =
know what violence is. I am the epitome of violence. The innovator. The onl=
y individuals I've seen you destroy are your own comrades. Not that it's a =
bad thing to destroy your comrades, I've destroyed plenty of lackeys in my =
time.

    Leader: I think you're only saying this because you've joined an=
other council! I think you need to be dealt with! You're nothing more than =
a vicious traitor!

    Deemos: So you guys are going to deal with me? Put =
me away? Send me to the great junkyard in the sky?

    Member: Junkyard?

=
    Leader: Enough of this, get him!

    Deemos stands up. A member sittin=
g right next to him stands up as well, but he's too slow and too dumb. Deem=
os puts a pistol to his mid section quickly and fires. Several bolts rip th=
rough the robot, creating several flashes and one hole leading all the way =
through. The unlucky one falls to the ground. Deemos' trigger finger quickl=
y flicks a switch on the utility pistol as he swivels it around towards ano=
ther member who was raising a rifle. Deemos moves forward a single step and=
 barely dodges a shot heading his way. He fires the pistol and a barrage of=
 5 inch long steel nails are fired at rapid speed, piercing the head of the=
 attackee and tearing off large chunks. Deemos quickly spins around, flicki=
ng a switch once more and he fires. Several shots hit the robot who had fir=
ed at him, cutting down the bot who shocked at Deemos' speed and severing o=
ne of his arms and his head. The cut down fellow's head rolled across the f=
loor as the body dropped.

    Leader: Idiots!

    Deemos quickly fired a =
few pellets on the ground, which erupted into tall flames. He was hidden fr=
om sight. A shot emerges from behind the flames, passing Deemos' head by in=
ches.

    Leader: Did you hear that? I think I got him.

    A grenade fli=
es out from behind the fire and rolls near the Leader of the council's feet=
.

    (Cut to)

    Deemos runs through the halls of the building as a mas=
sive explosion erupts behind him, detonating the room he previously occupie=
d. It was no problem escaping from these buffoons, he thought as he exited =
the building, laughing at the fact that he destroyed about 20 or so more li=
ves. He decided to check his messages. His commlink system was designed to =
capture messages and hold them for a later hearing. He had two of these. He=
 activated the first one.

    Message: Hey, buddy, I got some of those (bu=
zz) were trying to get. It was (buzz) so, you wanna (buzz) we've--

    Dee=
mos deletes the message quickly. A wrong number and a bad commlink. He acti=
vates the next message. He listens to the code carefully then plays it back=
 again. He plays it back a third time.

    Deemos: Hmm. Maybe. This sounds=
 like the old code.

    He activates his jets and flies, planning to answe=
r this message addressing him and the the one that he knew well back on Ear=
th, Arrow. It had been a long time since he had come in contact with Razor.=
 He was ready for anything...

      ----- Original Message -----
      Fro=
m: RoboRick007
      To: Neo Beast Wars
      Sent: Sunday, August 11, 2002=
 11:03 PM
      Subject: Secret Messages


      : : Diesel : :

      On C=
ybertron a fuel tanker truck drives down an elevated street, before pulling=
 into what looked like an abandon building. The black and silver truck tran=
sformes into a menacing Cybertronian. A Decepticon too be exact. He turns t=
o the others in the building.

      Diesel: Hey Arrow, did you pick up tha=
t incoded transmission that came through the Transwarp portal?

      He aw=
aits a response.

      : : Wolfenstein : :

      While he follows Megatro=
n deeper into the base. His comm system picks up a transmission. However it=
 is heavily incoded so he cannot listen too it now. He sets his comm unit t=
o work on it, and continues on.


    Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject =
to the Yahoo! Terms of Service. 


        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
         =
     ADVERTISEMENT
             
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is su=
bject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
